cta: Help draw the world’s most collaborative animation!
definition:
Your contribution will just take a few seconds.
It’s like the telephone game, but visual.
prompt: Get in line! Just two quick steps.
stepNotify:
How do you want to be notified?
choose one or both
stepRobot:
Are you a human?
hint: check the box
task: As best you can, please trace the last person’s drawing as best you can.
